text: Tomara jene rakho ye parthiba jibanata to khela-dhulo o amoda-pramoda o jamkajamaka o tomadera nijedera madhye hamabara'i ebam dhanadaulata o santanasantatira pratiyogita matra. Eti brstira upamara mato yara utpadana casidera camatkrta kare, tarapara ta sukiye yaya, tumi takhana ta dekhate pa'o halade haye geche, abasese ta kharakuto haye yaya! Ara parakale rayeche kathora sasti, paksantare rayeche allahâ€Œra kacha theke paritrana o santasti. Ara parthiba jibana chalanamaya bhogabilasa bai to naya.
